entries.title: Speaker Pelosi Undecided on Whether the House Will Ban TikTok on Government Devices
entries.description: House Speaker Nancy Pelosi in Washington, on Dec. 1, 2022. (Anna Moneymaker/Getty Images)

entries.title: EncroChat Hack by French Was Law Enforcement Equivalent of ‘D-Day Landings,’ UK Tribunal Told
entries.description: Campaigners against the National Crime Agency's use of data hacked from EncroChat by French police protest outside the Old Bailey in London on May 27, 2022. (Chris Summers/The Epoch Times)

entries.title: EU Issues Threat to Elon Musk After Twitter Suspends Mainstream Journalists
entries.description: Owner and CEO of Twitter, Inc. Elon Musk arrives at the 29th Annual Baron Investment Conference in Manhattan in New York on Nov. 4, 2022. (Andrew Kelly/Reuters)

entries.title: Elon Musk Polls Twitter Users on Restoring Accounts of Journalists Banned for Doxxing Policy Violations
entries.description: Tesla CEO Elon Musk speaks at a gaming convention in Los Angeles, Calif., on June 13, 2019. (Mike Blake/Reuters)

entries.title: Twitter Suspends Accounts of Journalists From CNN, New York Times Under New Doxxing Policy
entries.description: Illustration of a cellphone displaying a photo of Elon Musk placed on a computer monitor filled with Twitter logos in Washington, D.C., on Aug. 5, 2022. (Samuel Corum/AFP via Getty Images)

entries.title: Gates, Bezos Invest in Australian-Designed Brain Implant
entries.description: Blue Origin founder Jeff Bezos speaks after receiving the 2019 International Astronautical Federation (IAF) Excellence in Industry Award during the the 70th International Astronautical Congress at the Walter E. Washington Convention Center in Washington, DC on October 22, 2019.  (Mandel Ngan/AFP via Getty Images)

entries.title: Microsoft to Roll Out ‘Data Boundary’ for EU Customers From Jan. 1
entries.description: Smartphone in front of Microsoft logo on July 26, 2021. (Dado Ruvic/Illustratio/Reuters)

entries.title: Twitter Censorship Contributed to Destructive Pandemic Policies and Is Criminal, Says Former White House COVID Adviser
entries.description: Dr. Scott Atlas, a public health policy expert, in California on April 17, 2021. (Tal Atzmon/The Epoch Times)
